parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
[MOD-DE-MSG-3] MsgGrantOperatorAuthorization grants an operator authorization
to a grantee on behalf of an authority.

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

authority.description: authority is the group account granting the authorization.

operator.description:
operator is the optional account authorized by the authority to run this
Msg.

grantee.description: grantee is the account that receives the authorization from authority.

msg_types.description:
msg_types is the list of VPR delegable message types for which
authorization is granted.

expiration.description: expiration is the optional timestamp after which the authorization expires.

authz_spend_limit.description: authz_spend_limit is the optional maximum spendable amount.

authz_spend_limit_period.description:
authz_spend_limit_period is the optional reset period for
authz_spend_limit.

with_feegrant.description: with_feegrant indicates whether to also grant a fee allowance.

feegrant_spend_limit.description:
feegrant_spend_limit is the optional maximum fee amount. Ignored if
with_feegrant is false.

feegrant_spend_limit_period.description:
feegrant_spend_limit_period is the optional reset period for
feegrant_spend_limit. Ignored if with_feegrant is false.

verana.de.v1.MsgGrantOperatorAuthorizati.description:
[MOD-DE-MSG-3] MsgGrantOperatorAuthorization grants an operator authorization
to a grantee on behalf of an authority.

MsgGrantOperatorAuthorizationResponse defines the response for
MsgGrantOperatorAuthorization.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description:
params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

verana.de.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

verana.de.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResponse.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

verana.de.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.
